document.full_text: buoyed by a run on denim, sales of women's apparel rose 2.8 percent over the three months ending in february 2011, according to the npd group, a market research firm.
document.title: drilling down: a popular wrinkle in denim shopping
lines_and_colors: buoyed by a run on denim, sales of women's apparel rose 2.8 percent over the three months ending in february 2011, according to the npd group, a market research firm.
